name: TORIA
overview:
TORIA with its big experience, knows exactly what is needed to provide that extra-added value, tailor made solutions, greater efficiency and a fully comprehensive service adapted to each and every individual case. We find ourselves faced with a changing tourist scenario, and our priority is to optimize the different business processes for our client, offering a personalized service and maximum quality.

Our comprehensive offer is designed to satisfy the requirements of the individual traveler, groups and companies in Macedonia destination: we offer destination services for leisure travel, cruises and events, making the most of the synergies of our different business units.

  • Online accommodation reservations
  • Online reservation of excursion, transfers, car rental, coach tours and fly & drive
  • The possibility to apply online for quotations for tailor made group program, incentives and other events
  • 24 hours online confirmation
  • Possibility to manage private allotments
  • Online access to detailed accommodation descriptions with photos
  • Possibility of printing vouchers
  • Online sales statistics & handling of booking
  • Single or multi product reservations
